snippet: New concerns over Russia and Ukraine sent the Dow to 16,429.47, its lowest level since mid-May.
abstract: Stock market falls amid new concerns that tensions could escalate between Russia and Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: New concerns over Russia and Ukraine sent the Dow to 16,429.47, its lowest level since mid-May.

headline.main: Ukraine Tensions Depress an Already Falling Market
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Tensions Depress an Already Falling Market
